tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FinancialTransactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES RetinaScanningData(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE RetinaScanningData (
    user_id INT,
    retina_id UUID,
    scan_date TIMESTAMP,
    scan_result BOOLEAN,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FinancialTransactions (
    transaction_id UUID,
    user_id INT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    PRIMARY KEY (transaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE BiometricAuthentication (
    user_id INT,
    authentication_method VARCHAR(50),
    authentication_date TIMESTAMP,
    authentication_result BOOLEAN,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, authentication_method)
);
